website_summaries.verdict: A streamlined contour palette that explains, in detail, exactly where to apply each shade.
pros: Includes bronzer, contour powder and highlighter
Instructions tell you which shades to use in which spots
Fantastic for hiding dark circles and other blemishes
Shades are great for skin that's medium or darker
cons: Darker shades may be too dark for those with light skin

customer_reviews.title: This cannot truly be Smashbox. I have one that ...
customer_reviews.text: This cannot truly be Smashbox. I have one that I ordered before this that I KNOW is definitely genuine and then I got this one. You can tell that the bottom one is grainy which is the one I ordered here. See for yourself in these pics.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars for now...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a huge smashbox fan! I'm a contour newb. This comes with a cute little brush and a pamphlet to tell you what to do with it all. Cons: It was hard to blend with the brush it came with (if you don’t use it on top of decent foundation) and didn't last all day. I'm going to try liquid instead and use this for touch ups. Edit: I use this in combination with the liquid. I really enjoy how it blends over foundation. I use the brush it came with on blush.
customer_reviews.author: K.

customer_reviews.title: Great for begininners
customer_reviews.text: LOVE. if you're new to contouring then this is the pallet for you. I love so much. Two different contouring colors and a cream color as well. Comes with a nice brush and mirror and directions on the mirror on how to contour.
customer_reviews.author: Delaney Lovell

customer_reviews.title: I love that this comes with instructions for a beginner like ...
customer_reviews.text: I love that this comes with instructions for a beginner like me. It shows you how to use the contouring on all different facial shapes. It does not last very long but I don't use any primer or anything so that could be why. Great contouring kit and good value.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: No mess, Goes on cleanly, Perfect set of shades for subtle sculpting
customer_reviews.text: I love a more natural look and this palette is perfect to sculpt with very natural blending. The size is portable but still big enough to get plenty of powder on a large powder brush or blush brush. I have had issues with some of my sculpting pallets breaking inside my purse and making a massive mess, but this one has proven through the test of time and being banged around in my purse with no breakage. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Deb M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect contouring for on-the-go!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and there's a diagram inside that's really nicely laminated next to the mirror that shows you exactly where to put each color. Smashbox always impresses me and this product is no exception. The powder is well-made, doesn't cake up on your face and is SOOO easy to blend. I I went from using contouring sticks galore to this being my go-to. It's worth the extra $ for the high quality and how long the palette lasts. Love love love it.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke G

customer_reviews.title: Love this contour kit
customer_reviews.text: Love this contour kit. The "highlighter" is great for me because it's not shimmery like some others so you can use it under the eye without looking like a drag queen. Great color
customer_reviews.author: erinthehun

customer_reviews.title: Great genuine product!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this pallet. It is the genuine product, comes in brand new packaging and plastic wrap. The box includes a small make-up brush with it. (Personally I would recommend this brush for the highlighter but not for the bronzers.) Would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if its real smashbox
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and to be honest the brush completely fell apart after one use little black hairs all over and the set itself is extremely grainy, I don't know it just doesn't look real, I will not buy this again. I know there are much better products out there.
customer_reviews.author: Ally5875

customer_reviews.title: Good Contour, Poor Highlight
customer_reviews.text: The woman who helped me at Sephora used this exact palette, so I bought it. I now use it every day. However, the highlight is weak and flat. Even the woman at Sephora used a different one on me. Still, I use this contour everyday but not so much the bronzer. (I'm a beginner and I'm afraid of bronzer, haha!)
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Morgan

customer_reviews.title: I do not believe that this is a genuine smashbox ...
customer_reviews.text: I do not believe that this is a genuine smashbox contour kit. The highlighter is a very dark yellow and shortly after applying myself and my daughter ended up with chemical burns on our faces. This was a disaster.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS ONE
customer_reviews.text: This is the ONLY product ive really really enjoyed using ...it goes on smoothly the color blends really nicely and doesnt crack it seriously is AMAZIIIIING
customer_reviews.author: mama bear

customer_reviews.title: My go to
customer_reviews.text: Love this palette. I have a cheaper one that is also very good, but when I need my makeup to look professional, I go for this one. High quality, small and easily fits in most cosmetic cases.
customer_reviews.author: Thyme Basil

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: It’s just the best. You won’t be disappointed. It lasts a long time and is super easy to perfect your contour.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M.

customer_reviews.title: I have very fair skin so the darker colors are great. The highlighter is very subtle and matte
customer_reviews.text: Surprised how much a little goes a long way. I have very fair skin so the darker colors are great. The highlighter is very subtle and matte, however, so depending on there looks you're going for and skin tone you may need to buy a brighter highlighter. Great quality set.
customer_reviews.author: C_

customer_reviews.title: On my second one
customer_reviews.text: I have dark circles, this with the color corrector work great. Does not settle into wrinkles. Don't use the contouring as often, usually when going out, but works well also.
customer_reviews.author: RZ

customer_reviews.title: Dupe Product
customer_reviews.text: I’m 99% sure this is a dupe. Had trouble blending onto face and poor pigment. Ordered through Sephora and did not have those issues. Visibly different.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Broome

customer_reviews.title: Great product. My mom really enjoys it
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My mom really enjoys it. It's bold but subtle at the same time. Doesn't look cakey which is always good
customer_reviews.author: Shahnoza Holboeva

customer_reviews.title: So glad I was able to get through Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Local store ran out. So glad I was able to get through Amazon. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Val in Cal

customer_reviews.title: Easy to contour and love that it comes with instructions ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to contour and love that it comes with instructions and a brush for contouring newbies like me :)
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to use for people like myself who aren't very ...
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to use for people like myself who aren't very good at contouring. My friend had this product and once I used it I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Like the damn Kardashians
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product but works better with a good primer. Great for beginners, I've never contoured before and this comes with instructions that were super easy to understand. Worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Love it and the brush it came with is very ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it and the brush it came with is very soft and no bristle fall out even when I clean it.
customer_reviews.author: patricia j kequom

customer_reviews.title: The brush that comes with is not really good quality, but other than that I love the ...
customer_reviews.text: The brush that comes with is not really good quality, but other than that I love the kit. It comes with instructions if you need a step by step of how to apply. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: This contour kit is amazing! The contour color is perfect to my skin ...
customer_reviews.text: This contour kit is amazing! The contour color is perfect to my skin tone. Too bad that they do not sell it separately :/
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: my favorite out there. use a damp brush for darker application of powders
customer_reviews.author: Alex & Amanda Peterson Family

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kit for subtle contours and light touch-up. Very natural looking.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: i love it and blends naturally
customer_reviews.text: third time i get it! i love it and blends naturally! recommended if you are going for a simple/natural look.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This is not a Smashbox Contour Kit. The powder is totally different. Not the same color or formula.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Rowland

customer_reviews.title: Cost benefit
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply and fits very well daily make ups.
customer_reviews.author: Melpnd

customer_reviews.title: I’m excited this use this but I didn’t get the ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m excited this use this but I didn’t get the brush. Now I have to spend more money and buy a brush. :(
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Good but...
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it doesnt work for me. It does look good after i finish but like 5 min and it is gone! Though i using a primer and a fondation so it is supposed to stay more but it doesnt
customer_reviews.author: Sameera Beti

customer_reviews.title: Multiple uses for this great product.
customer_reviews.text: Wow what a product! I use this to contour and as a cover up for the many sun discoloration a I've accumulated. It works on my neck, face and shoulders. Great pigmentation and coverage. This is my second purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra E. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect! I have tried a lot of other contour ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect! I have tried a lot of other contour powder options including Anastasia's contour; however, this was the best in my opinion. I have olive skin and it blended perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: tonimarie123

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend a liquid contour kit instead
customer_reviews.text: Product does not apply well to skin. I would recommend a liquid contour kit instead.
customer_reviews.author: The engineer

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have bought because I tend to use the highlighter the most! Good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kate N.

customer_reviews.title: It is still in good condition but I had to throw the brush away ...
customer_reviews.text: I received the product that claimed to be brand new with the packaging open and ripped, and the brush that came with it had been used. It is still in good condition but I had to throw the brush away because it had been used.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Vance

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for fair skin tones and oily complexions
customer_reviews.text: Most contour kits are warm rather than cool. This one is cool making it more of a shadow (contour), instead of a sunkiss (bronzer). I would especially suggest this for fair skin tones. Also, it's a powder as opposed to a cream. This is helpful if you have oily skin because it doesn't add oil and weigh you down. I've also noticed an increase in my SO's sexual appetite.... not sure if contour related.
customer_reviews.author: JuliaBlue

customer_reviews.title: Love this !!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Contor kit I had to buy a new one the other one ran out . This lasted me almost a year best formula ever
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Product!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product! It really gives your face a natural beauty and glow. I did not want to spend the money, but it lasted a good 6 months, and I use it every day. I will never be without it.If you like a natural glow this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jamiemichelle

customer_reviews.title: but still not happy about my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I got my contour kit in and I was so excited to try it out. But I opened the box and I only had 2 out of three of the countor kit. Epic fail! They did take it back, but still not happy about my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great colors and for traveling
customer_reviews.text: I used waaay too much at first, but now that I know a tiny-tiny bit got a long way, I really like it! I love the far left shade (cool brown) for my fair skin to countour my cheekbones and under my chin. The middle shade (warm brown) is great as bronzer and both are matte. The right white shade is just barely shimmery and is great for a natural highlight on my nose. I don't like the brush though. Its a great travel size too and has been my go-to recently.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Blain

customer_reviews.title: Heard such great things about this palette but on me
customer_reviews.text: Heard such great things about this palette but on me, the cool contour shade looks splotchy no matter how much blending I do, no matter what brush I use, no matter what foundation, primer, etc., I use. The highlight powder is perfect for under eye setting, no glitter or shine that I can see and the darker bronzer shade is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ev Murphy

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: I don't wear much makeup and I have basically no idea how to contour. I really like this stuff. I am fairly fair skinned but it adds a really subtle shade and is so easy to use. I like the brush as well and all three colors are useful.
customer_reviews.author: mmh

customer_reviews.title: Viola! Fast, easy cheekbones.
customer_reviews.text: So darn easy to do! This kit is the bomb. I was afraid it would be too light, I am fair with blue eyes but still I wanted to SEE the contours and I did! It takes two seconds, follow included directions and viola! My husband even said, "You have cheekbones!". Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Seaside Designer

customer_reviews.title: Not at all happy and not sure it's truly smashbox
customer_reviews.text: Smash box? Are we sure? Doesn't blend well. Doesn't go on smooth. Requires a lot of powder for pigment which means it's very little pigment with a lot of compounds. Not at all happy and not sure it's truly smashbox.
customer_reviews.author: turtle

customer_reviews.title: the perfect "starter" contour kit-- and I am not a starter ...
customer_reviews.text: all you need to contour in one little palette. the other ones have too many colors to bring around with you all the time. the perfect "starter" contour kit-- and I am not a starter and it's probably my fave product I've found in the last 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: I bought it for my sister because she was obsessed with this brand but to be honest there are soooo many better option at a more
customer_reviews.text: The product is okay as long as you dont applied with the brush that came with it... I bought it for my sister because she was obsessed with this brand but to be honest there are soooo many better option at a more affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Angel

customer_reviews.title: In general I love Smashbox makeup
customer_reviews.text: In general I love Smashbox makeup. In all honesty I have no clue how to contour, but this made it so simple. The shades match my skin tone perfectly. I love the guide that came with it. It shows the way to properly contour based on different face shapes. It's a product that I'll continue using
customer_reviews.author: Justine Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great even for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I am bew to contouring. This palette makes it so easy. I love it. It comes with a guide for all different face shapes.
customer_reviews.author: Party of Five

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love the step-by-step instructions; it looks so natural. Wish I had something like this years ago!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Great gift and also for personal use !!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted it for Christmas and loves it !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brush is rubbish
customer_reviews.text: The brush falls apart with first use. The colors are great, but don't use the brush!! The hairs will stick to your face!
customer_reviews.author: Vintrin

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, fast shipping, second order of the same product and very nice product as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Great deal, fast shipping, second order of the same product and very nice product as expected.
customer_reviews.author: FAHAD A. ALTWAIJRI

customer_reviews.title: The product is quite good. The brush is of low quality
customer_reviews.text: The product is quite good. The brush is of low quality, by the third day the bristles were falling apart and all over my face. I had to buy another brush from a well-known brand.
customer_reviews.author: idialuza

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. Very easy to apply and looks nature
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Very easy to apply and looks nature. I've never used contour and it doesn't take too much training.
customer_reviews.author: Jyhyang Huang

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased (:
customer_reviews.text: It was as if I bought this right out of Sephora!! Very pleased (:
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The brush is extremely poor quality and the powder is a lot looser- not ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used Smashbox contour kit before and generally buy it from Ulta. I purchased this online because it was $5 cheaper and regret it immediately. Although the packaging seems legitimate the product cannot be smashbox. The brush is extremely poor quality and the powder is a lot looser- not the same formula. I am going to bring it to Ulta today as their Smashbox rep happens to be in store. Be cautious before purchasing this item- there is something off.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky A.

customer_reviews.title: Made it right, thank you!
customer_reviews.text: The first one I ordered was missing the brush so I left a review that said I didn't get the brush so I wasn't completely satisfied. But Natural Center very kindly replaced the first kit and the new one does indeed have the brush in it! I'm sorry that I missed your attempts to contact me, I fear the messages went to my Junk folder so I really appreciate the initiative you took to replace the kit! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: G. Caputo

customer_reviews.title: This is SUPER small. Each color is about the size of ...
customer_reviews.text: This is SUPER small. Each color is about the size of a small eyeshadow. For the money, there are ways to get much better contouring. I'm not overly impressed with the application and you really need to use a better brush than the one that's provided.
customer_reviews.author: alW

customer_reviews.title: his
customer_reviews.text: this product is not the same as the smashbox kits sold in stores. This is a knock off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These beauty blenders work great. They have not fallen apart, and are easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet23

customer_reviews.title: Great for someone doing contouring for the first time
customer_reviews.text: Great for someone doing contouring for the first time, which is why I bought it. I think I would prefer a liquid form for highlighting, but the dark shade is great! I thought it would appear to dark on my fair skin, but it is nice and I notice my features *pop* out more... especially on tired days!
customer_reviews.author: Christy F

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!!!
customer_reviews.text: This makes a huge difference in m finished look! It really helps to make your face look a little slimmer in all the right spots. The brush also works well, it isn't great quality but it gets the job done! I will for sure be purchasing another once I run out : )
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is one my favorite products in my make-up supply!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

product_meta.title: SmashBox Step By Step Contour Kit With Light Medium Brush, Brown, 4 Ounce
product_meta.description: Smashbox Step By Step Contour Kit with Light Medium Brush
feature_bullets: This item is not a Tester
